title: Citeck Action Schema
description: Schema for Citeck action YAML files
x-intellij-html-description:
Schema for Citeck action files

  • Actions can be executed on records in journals or record dashboard
  • One action can be used in different parts of the system

confirm.x-intellij-html-description:
Configuration for the confirmation dialog

  • If not specified, the action executes without confirmation
  • Can display a simple message or a complex form
  • Form data can be mapped to action configuration

formRef.x-intellij-html-description:
Reference to a form to display in the confirmation dialog

  • If specified, the message property is ignored
  • Format: uiserv/form@[form-id]

formAttributes.description: Attributes to pass to the confirmation form
formAttributes.x-intellij-html-description:
Additional attributes to pass to the confirmation form

  • Can include constants or record attributes using ${attribute} syntax

attributesMapping.description: Mapping of attributes from confirmation form to action configuration
attributesMapping.x-intellij-html-description:
Maps data from the confirmation form to action configuration

  • Key: path in the action configuration
  • Value: field name in the confirmation form
  • Example: "body.comment": "comment" maps the comment field from the form to body.comment in the action config

features.x-intellij-html-description:
Configuration for action execution contexts

  • Controls where and how the action can be used
  • Single record, multiple records, or query-based execution

execForRecord.description: Whether the action can be executed for a single record
execForRecord.x-intellij-html-description:
Whether the action can be executed for a single record

  • When true, available for individual records in journals or on record cards

execForRecords.description: Whether the action can be executed for selected records
execForRecords.x-intellij-html-description:
Whether the action can be executed for selected records

  • When true, available in the dropdown above tables when users select records

execForQuery.description: Whether the action can be executed for the entire query
execForQuery.x-intellij-html-description:
Whether the action can be executed for the entire query

  • When true, available in the dropdown above tables even when no records are selected
  • Applies to all records matching the current filter

id.x-intellij-html-description:
Unique identifier for the action

  • Must be unique among all actions in the system
  • Use hyphen-case or camelCase naming convention

key.x-intellij-html-description:
Key for filtering and grouping actions

  • Should be in dot-separated format: word0.word1.word2
  • Allows filtering by mask patterns

type.description: Action type that determines execution logic

open-in-background.description: Open record in a new background tab

download.description: Download content related to the record

download-card-template.description: Download printed version of the document

view-card-template.description: View printed version of the document in a new browser tab

upload-new-version.description: Upload a new version of the document

create.description: Create a new record, optionally with pre-filled attributes

content-preview-modal.description: Show document preview in a modal window

fetch.description: Send a request to the specified URL

view-business-process.description: View business process (window with process preview and additional actions)

mutate.description: Modify record attributes without user interaction

tasks-actions.description: Action to load task completion variants

open-submit-form.description: Open edit form with attempt to submit for consideration

user-event.description: Trigger a user event that can be handled by BPMN process

transform.description: Enterprise feature - transform content according to specified rules

script.description: Execute custom script (JavaScript) to perform action logic

icon.x-intellij-html-description:
Icon for the action from Citeck icon font

  • Examples: icon-delete, icon-edit, icon-download
  • All icons can be viewed in citeck/ecos-ui/src/fonts/citeck/demo.html

config.x-intellij-html-description:
Configuration specific to the action type

  • Each action type has different configuration options
  • Can include interpolated values using ${attribute} syntax
  • Special case: ${recordRef} is always replaced with the current record reference

background.description: (view) Open record in a new application tab in background mode
background.x-intellij-html-description: (view) Open record in a new application tab in background mode

reopen.description: (view) Open record in the current application tab
reopen.x-intellij-html-description: (view) Open record in the current application tab

newBrowserTab.description: (view) Open record in a new browser tab
newBrowserTab.x-intellij-html-description: (view) Open record in a new browser tab

reopenBrowserTab.description: (view) Open record in the current browser tab (page reload)
reopenBrowserTab.x-intellij-html-description: (view) Open record in the current browser tab (with page reload)

attributes.description: (edit, create) Attributes to pass to the creation/edit form
attributes.x-intellij-html-description:
(edit, create) Attributes to pass to the creation or edit form

  • Can include record attributes using ${attribute} syntax

url.x-intellij-html-description:
(download, open-url, fetch) URL for the operation

  • For download: URL for downloading content
  • For open-url: URL to open
  • For fetch: URL to send request to
  • Can include ${recordRef} for current record substitution

isWaitResponse.x-intellij-html-description: (delete) Whether to wait for deletion response

format.x-intellij-html-description:
(download-card-template, view-card-template) Output format for document

  • Possible values: html, pdf, pdf2, docx

resultName.x-intellij-html-description: (download-by-template) Name of the file to be downloaded

requestParams.x-intellij-html-description: (download-by-template) Additional parameters to send to server

typeRef.description: (create) Type reference for creating new entity
typeRef.x-intellij-html-description:
(create) Reference to data type for creation

  • Format: emodel/type@[type-id]
  • Required parameter

createVariantId.x-intellij-html-description:
(create) Identifier of creation variant for the type

  • If not specified, first available variant is used

createVariant.x-intellij-html-description:
(create) Creation variant object for complete definition

  • Used when no suitable creation variant from type exists

redirectToPage.x-intellij-html-description: (create) Whether to redirect to created entity

download.description: (save-as-case-template) Download template or redirect to dashboard
download.x-intellij-html-description:
(save-as-case-template) Download behavior

  • true - Download template
  • false - Redirect to template dashboard

scale.x-intellij-html-description:
(content-preview-modal) Document scale for preview

  • Possible values: auto, 0-4, page-fit, page-height, page-width

method.x-intellij-html-description:
(fetch) HTTP method for request

  • Possible values: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH

args.x-intellij-html-description:
(fetch) Arguments to pass in URL

  • Added as query parameters

body.description: (fetch) Arguments to pass in request body
body.x-intellij-html-description: (fetch) Arguments to pass in request body

workflowFromRecord.x-intellij-html-description:
(view-business-process) How to get workflow ID

  • true - Get workflow ID from the record passed to action
  • false - The record value is the workflow ID

id.x-intellij-html-description:
Record ID for modification

  • Optional parameter
  • Can use ${recordRef} for current record

attributes.description: Attributes to modify and their values

implSourceId.x-intellij-html-description:
(mutate) Implementation source ID

  • Format: ARTIFACT_ID/action-id
  • Used to get download link from a record

hideConfirmEmptyForm.x-intellij-html-description:
(tasks-actions) Whether to hide confirmation for empty form

  • When true, tasks with empty forms will be completed without confirmation

formId.x-intellij-html-description:
(open-submit-form) Form ID to open

  • Optional parameter; default form is loaded if not specified

eventData.x-intellij-html-description:
(user-event) Event data payload

  • Can include record attributes using ${attribute} syntax
  • For entity references, use ${attribute?id} syntax

input.x-intellij-html-description:
(transform) Content source configuration

  • Default: main content of current document

transformations.x-intellij-html-description:
(transform) Content transformations configuration

  • Array of transformation objects

output.x-intellij-html-description:
(transform) Transformation result target

  • Default: temporary file that is immediately downloaded

predicate.x-intellij-html-description:
Predicate for conditionally controlling action visibility

  • Used to dynamically determine action availability based on record properties
  • For example, Edit and Delete actions can be hidden for users without write permissions

timeoutErrorMessage.description: Error message displayed on action timeout

execForRecordsBatchSize.description: Batch size for processing multiple records
execForRecordsBatchSize.x-intellij-html-description:
Number of records to process in a single batch

  • Used for optimizing performance when executing action on many records

execForRecordsParallelBatchesCount.description: Number of parallel batches for processing records
execForRecordsParallelBatchesCount.x-intellij-html-description:
Number of batches to process in parallel

  • Used for optimizing performance when executing action on many records

preActionModule.x-intellij-html-description:
Reference to JavaScript module for pre-processing

  • Module must export execForRecord or execForRecords functions
  • Called before the main action execution
  • Can modify action configuration or provide partial results
